## Overview

This document contains the full Gemini research output for all 70 guardrails for preventing AI-generated code issues. Each guardrail follows the condensed format specification with E-E-A-T signals for optimal SEO.

**Note:** The full detailed content with all 70 guardrails is preserved in the original research submission. This file serves as a placeholder and tracking document. The complete research output should be processed and integrated into the site structure.

## Structure

- 70 guardrails organized by category:
  - Data Integrity (10)
  - Security (22)
  - Performance (11)
  - Availability (9)
  - Financial (8)
  - Integration (10)
  - Testing (10)

- Each guardrail includes:
  - Slug, Category, Severity
  - One-sentence problem statement
  - 5-6 actionable prevention checklist items
  - One-line early detection (CI/CD, Static, Runtime)
  - 3-step mitigation
  - E-E-A-T signals
  - Workflow and pain point links
